kv14.8:5.3: Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ rūpaṃ nibbānaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ … pe … phoṭṭhabbāyatananti?
kv14.8:6.6: diṭṭhigatasampayuttā vedanā saññā cetanā cittaṃ akusalanti?
kv14.8:7.8: Hañci saphalaṃ savipākaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.8:8.5: Hañci micchādiṭṭhiparamāni vajjāni vuttāni bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.8:10.4: “micchādiṭṭhissa kho ahaṃ, puṇṇa, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi—
kv14.8:11.5: “‘sassato loko’ti kho, vaccha, abyākatametaṃ, ‘asassato loko’ti kho, vaccha, abyākatametaṃ, ‘antavā loko’ti kho, vaccha, abyākatametaṃ, ‘anantavā loko’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.7: ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.9: ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.11: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.13: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.15: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha … pe …
kv14.8:11.17: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti kho, vaccha, abyākatametan”ti.
kv14.8:12.4: “micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhisamattaṃ samādinnaṃ, yañca vacīkammaṃ … pe …
kv14.8:12.6: yañca manokammaṃ, yā ca cetanā, yā ca patthanā, yo ca paṇidhi, ye ca saṅkhārā, sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti.
